title: Where Is The Snowdown Shop?

replies.body: It's still coming. There is an issue we're working to resolve ASAP.
By the time it goes live, I'll be in rural midwest, away from my League Client and a steady internet connection :(

At this point, we don't have plans to extend it. The event runs December 16 - December 30. When are you leaving, if you don't mind my asking? The team's been working overnight into today to get this working properly.  We're trying to work out issues that were preventing some players from receiving all of their offers.
We're starting to roll out now, region by region.

Thanks for the update!

It hit my account - but it's nothing I wanted ... which makes me feel bad because you worked so hard to keep me updated ... not sure how you all came up with {{champion:12}} or {{champion:35}} ... I guess I can kind of see where {{champion:12}} might fit my style, but ... not a big fan.  Shaco is literally the opposite of everything I like in the game.

I can see where the other choices came from but ... two are my least favorite skins for those champs (Urgot and Xin), the other two are "welp I already have the skins I want to play on those guys" (Pantheon and Lee Sin)

Any chance to re-roll these?
Sorry to hear. D: Unfortunately, this time around, there isn't a re-roll option.
Hmm. Okay. I can keep you posted as soon as I get more info. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=tLZfk983,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-16T20:38:37.183+0000)
>
> It's still coming. There is an issue we're working to resolve ASAP.

Ya i just saw the Reddit link lol. Thanks though ^_^
Is it on it's way to the NA servers soon?

WHERE THE SNOWDOWN IS AT ?
WHERE THE MYSTERY GIFT AT ?
WHERE THE POROS AT ?
**WHERE THE LEAGUE IS AT !?**

#WHERE THE HOOD WHERE THE HOOD WHERE THE HOOD AT ...
Have that poro in the cut, where the wood at!?{{summoner:30}}
